game

Class GameFlow

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.GameFlow

  • public class GameFlow
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is for organizing the flow of the game. It is the class that recieve the request from UI and distribute to domain classes according to the type of the request. With this property, it works like a controller.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameFlow()
      A huge constructor which involves in creating nearly all the objects in the game, players list (the list to be able to follow the next player), card decks (for community, chance and roll once cards), the squareMap (an abstract board, a map holding the location information of the squares) and the landMap (similar to square, but only have lands in it).

      • startingload

        public static void startingload()
        Load the game to be started from a new game. Reading the set of instructions here, distributed among the game in proper classes. Reading from "Starting Instructions.txt"
        Modifies
        playerList, player's assets and cards, dice and speedDie

      • load

        public static void load()
        Load the game to be started from the latest save. [If it is not saved before, then it loads the starting instructions] Reading the set of instructions here, distributed among the game in proper classes. Reading from "Saved Instructions.txt"
        Modifies
        playerList, player's assets and cards, dice and speedDie

      • save

        public static void save()
        Saves the initial state of game. It writes to the "Starting Instructions.txt" so that the next time when the game is load, it can stay consistent and not be disappeared.

      • getLoc

        public static int[] getLoc(Cards card)
        Finding the location based on its name, searching through all the tracks.
        Parameters:
        card - card to be found the location of.
        Returns:
        the location of the land or null if it is not found.
        Requires:
        card to be a land card.

      • getLandName

        public static java.lang.String getLandName(int[] location)
        Returns the land name from the location.
        Parameters:
        location - card's location to be wanted to get.
        Returns:
        name of the card if it is found, otherwise null.
        Requires:
        location to be inside of the board's bound.

      • landJob

        public static void landJob(Player currentPlayer,
           LandCards currentLand,
           boolean hasBargain)
        Jobs to each specific property. Method for buying.
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - player that is landed on the property.
        currentLand - land card that is the landed property.
        hasBargain - if player has bargain or not.
        Requires:
        player to be one of the player in game and land to be one of the property in game
        Modifies
        player's money, cards list, building map, cards with color map and land's sold, owner

      • chanceJob

        public static java.lang.String chanceJob(Player player1,
                         ChanceCards x)
        Method for chance card's jobs. Looks for the type and calls the right method of chance card.
        Parameters:
        player1 - the player drawed the card.
        x - drawed card
        Returns:
        string message to be displayed in GUI.
        Requires:
        player to be one of the player in game and x to be one of the chance cards in game.

        Parameters:

        x - drawed card
        Returns:
        string message to be displayed in GUI.
        Requires:
        player to be one of the player in game and x to be one of the chance cards in game.

        Parameters:

        facingValue - the facing value on the die

        Requires:

      • isTransit

        public static boolean isTransit(int[] loc)
        Identifies whether the location is transit or not.
        Parameters:
        loc - location
        Returns:
        true if it is transit, otherwise false
        Requires:
        loc to be in bounds of board.

      • move

        public static void move(Player currPlayer,
        int sumOfDices)
        Handles the complex move structure in the Ultimate Monopoly.
        Parameters:
        currPlayer - player needed to move
        sumOfDices - sum of the rolled dices (if speed die is number, it is added or just regular dice)
        Requires:
        currPlayer to be one of the player in game
        Modifies
        player's location

      • MrMonopolyMove

        public static void MrMonopolyMove(Player currPlayer,
                  int sumOfDices)
        Handles the complex Mr. Monopoly Move action when speed die is rolled as Mr. Monopoly.
        Parameters:
        currPlayer - player needed to move
        sumOfDices - sum of the rolled dices (if speed die is number, it is added or just regular dice)
        Requires:
        currPlayer to be one of the player in game
        Modifies
        player's location and money if player passes one of the pay corners.

        Parameters:
        currentPlayerLoc -
        Returns:
        Land card found based on the location.
        Requires:

        public static int trackLength(int track)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Requires:

      • buy

        public static void buy(Player currentPlayer,
       CapCompany capCo,
       boolean hasBargain)
        This method is used for buying cabCo
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - player who is land on one of the capCo
        capCo - Cab Company that is landed on.
        hasBargain - if player has bargain or not.
        Requires:
        player to be one of the player in game and land to be one of the Cab Company in game
        Modifies
        player's money, card list and cab company's owner and sold attributes.
